message:
CONVERSATION 1
Her: huh.
Him: idk. mine was definitely nya from lego ninjago. or jesse from jesse. or the icarly girls. or hannah montana.
Her: Wow, you really had a thing for animated characters, huh? I guess I should start practicing my Disney princess waves then ;)
Him: Haha, well you better work on your princess skills because I'll be waiting for my fairytale ending with you!

CONVERSATION 2
Her: huh.
Him: idk. mine was definitely nya from lego ninjago. or jesse from jesse. or the icarly girls. or hannah montana.
Her: So, you were into all these TV girls, huh? Well, lucky for you, I'm the real-life version of all of them combined, with a little extra sass!
Him: No way! A real-life fusion of my childhood crushes? I must've hit the jackpot. Can't wait to see that sassy side of yours!

CONVERSATION 3
Her: huh.
Him: idk. mine was definitely nya from lego ninjago. or jesse from jesse. or the icarly girls. or hannah montana.
Her: Interesting choices! But don't worry, I'm here to replace all of them with my killer charm and undeniable awesomeness. Brace yourself!
Him: Who needs animated crushes when the real-life version is right in front of me? Brace yourself, indeed. I'm ready for the awesomeness!

CONVERSATION 4
Her: huh.
Him: idk. mine was definitely nya from lego ninjago. or jesse from jesse. or the icarly girls. or hannah montana.
Her: Well, well, well, looks like I have some tough competition with all these iconic girls. Better bring my A-game then, because I thrive under pressure.
Him: Don't worry, I have a feeling you'll outshine them all. It's time for a modern-day love story with the coolest and most iconic girl I know!

CONVERSATION 5
Her: huh.
Him: idk. mine was definitely nya from lego ninjago. or jesse from jesse. or the icarly girls. or hannah montana.
Her: Wait, you had crushes on all those girls? I hope you're ready because I'm about to give them a run for their money! Get ready to be blown away.
Him: Oh, I'm more than ready for the incoming storm of awesomeness. Bring it on, because I can't wait to be blown away by you!
prompt:
I'm creating an AI bot designed to help teenage guys talk to girls. I need you to generate some conversations.

    Here is the sample conversation-

    Her : incredibly sagacious person. 
    Him : yes yes yes. totally.

    An example of a valid answers for this convesation would be-

    CONVERSATION
    Her : im super wise wtf
    Him : of course, Socrates ;)
    ,
    CONVERSATION
    Her : im so smart
    Him : does that mean that our children will be intelligent baby  ;)

    I emphasis this again - the messages from 'her' and 'him' must have the same theme as the prompt. They must be funny, witty and charming. They must be sexy and attractive. The conversations must be in Gen Z slang. lmao, lol, cringe and cap would be appreciated. Make them as sarcastic as possible.

    I need 5 conversations like this, with unique messages for her and him.

    Here is your prompt. 
    Her : Her : huh.  
    Him : Him : idk. mine was definitely nya from lego ninjago. or jesse from jesse. or the icarly girls. or hannah montana. 
    
    The 5 Conversations must have unique messages for her and him. The prompt for 'her' must be different everytime.
